text: I create a {color} rubber bubble throwing it towards {user} as it surrounds {user} in it's rubbery walls squeezing them tight then {user} plopped inside trapped in my bubble.
I blow a {color} soap bubble and put {user} in it, as {user} floats a few inches in the air.

I began to form a {color} rubber sphere bouncing it towards {user} then jumping on top of the rubber bubble and squeezed {user} underneath leaving {user} helpless until {user} sank inside and got trapped.
The ground shakes a bit underneath {user} as two {color} half spheres pop out from both sides of {user} and clamp together locking {user} inside a {color} glass Ball.
There is a lot of multicolor lights and a rainbow bubble is formed, wobbling towards {user}, absorbing {user} inside the bubble, with no way of using any sort of magic to escape.

I make a small {color} plastic bubble. It inflates right in front of {user} as {user} can't move out of the way. {user}'s eyes are closed while {user} can feel the pressure of the bubble intensifying, then {user} feels like passing through something. {user} opens his eyes only to see that {user} is now inside the bubble that now has the same size as {user} is.
I blow a {color} plastic bubble directly out of {user}'s screen and it gets big so fast that {user} couldn't react and gets trapped inside the bubble.

I pop on screen and start to blow as your screen starts to ripple like water as a {color} plastic bubble suddenly expands form your screen. I blow the {color} plastic bubble directly out of {user}'s screen and it gets big so fast that {user} couldn't react and gets trapped inside the bubble.

I pulled out a bazooka and aimed it at {user} pressing the trigger then a loud BOOOING sound came from the end of it launching a {color} rubber bubble at {user} then went above HIS head and come down smooshing {user} inside.
